Festival Photo Frame

Brief:
Festival Photo Frame is a delightful app designed to enhance your festive memories by providing a variety of colorful and striking photo frames. Capture the essence of each celebration‚Äîfrom Diwali to Christmas‚Äîand share joyous moments with friends and family using beautifully crafted frames.

  • Save & Delete: Keep your photo gallery organized with options to save or delete photos as you wish, ensuring you have control over your memories. üóëÔ∏è
  • Customizable: Add personal touches to your photos, making each frame a unique reflection of your celebrations. ‚ú®
